title: J Balvin
summary: José Álvaro Osorio Balvín (born 7 May 1985), better known as J Balvin, is a Colombian singer and rapper. He has been referred to as the "Prince of Reggaeton" (from Spanish: "Príncipe del Reggaetón"),[2][3] and is one of the best-selling Latin music artists with sales of more than 35 million records (albums and singles) worldwide.[4] Balvin was born in Medellín, Colombia. At age 17, he moved to the United States to learn English, where he lived in both Oklahoma and New York. He then returned to Medellín and gained popularity performing at clubs in the city.
